flawed_nl_solution:
Captain America is 1456/13 = <<1456/13=112>>112 years old
Peter Parker is 112/ 7 = <<112/7=61>>61 years old
Ironman is 61 + 32 = <<61+32=93>>93 years old

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16.0, not 61.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
